mainText:
I remember the days when we used to fight, convincing people to convert 
to Apple. We don't anymore because you came back to Apple and changed 
things even more.

You are my hero.

We will miss you.

You saw 10 years ahead of everyone.

I can't believe you are gone, I thought you were going to rest and be 
there. I have just about every Apple and Mac except the Lisa and the emate.
header: You taught me to THINK DIFFERENTLY
author: Rashantha
